trans-unit.source: Adriana's Valor
trans-unit.target: 亚卓安娜之勇

trans-unit.resname: CN2·1 | Adriana's Valor | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Hidden agenda (Start the game with this conspiracy face down in the command zone and secretly name a card. You may turn this conspiracy face up any time and reveal the chosen name.)\nWhenever a creature you control with the chosen name attacks, you may pay {W}. If you do, that creature gains indestructible until end of turn. (Damage and effects that say "destroy" don't destroy it.)
trans-unit.target: 秘案（开始游戏时将此诡局牌面朝下地置于统帅区，并私下决定一个牌名。你随时可以将此诡局翻回正面并公布该名称。） 每当一个由你操控且具该名称的生物攻击时，你可以支付{W}。若你如此作，则该生物获得不灭异能直到回合结束。（伤害与注明「消灭」的效应不会将它消灭。）

trans-unit.resname: CN2·2 | Assemble the Rank and Vile | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Assemble the Rank and Vile

trans-unit.resname: CN2·2 | Assemble the Rank and Vile | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Hidden agenda (Start the game with this conspiracy face down in the command zone and secretly name a card. You may turn this conspiracy face up any time and reveal the chosen name.)\nCreatures you control with the chosen name have "When this creature dies, you may pay {B}. If you do, put a 2/2 black Zombie creature token onto the battlefield tapped."
trans-unit.target: 秘案（开始游戏时将此诡局牌面朝下地置于统帅区，并私下决定一个牌名。你随时可以将此诡局翻回正面并公布该名称。） 由你操控且具该名称的生物具有「当此生物死去时，你可以支付{B}。若你如此作，则将一个2/2黑色灵俑衍生生物横置放进战场。」

trans-unit.source: Echoing Boon
trans-unit.target: 恩泽回响

trans-unit.resname: CN2·3 | Echoing Boon | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Hidden agenda (Start the game with this conspiracy face down in the command zone and secretly name a card. You may turn this conspiracy face up any time and reveal the chosen name.)\nWhenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, if it targets a creature you control with the chosen name, you may copy that spell and may choose new targets for the copy.
trans-unit.target: 秘案（开始游戏时将此诡局牌面朝下地置于统帅区，并私下决定一个牌名。你随时可以将此诡局翻回正面并公布该名称。） 每当你施放瞬间或法术咒语时，若它的目标是由你操控且具该名称的生物，则你可以复制该咒语，且可以为该复制品选择新的目标。

trans-unit.source: Emissary's Ploy
trans-unit.target: 密使手法

trans-unit.resname: CN2·4 | Emissary's Ploy | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: (Start the game with this conspiracy face up in the command zone.)\nBefore drawing your opening hand, choose 1, 2, or 3.\nYou may spend mana as though it were mana of any color to cast creature spells with converted mana cost equal to the chosen number.
trans-unit.target: （开始游戏时将此诡局牌面朝上地置于统帅区。） 于抓起手牌前，选择1，2或3。 对总法术力费用等同于该数字的生物咒语而言，你可以将法术力视同任意颜色的法术力来支付施放此类咒语的费用。

trans-unit.source: Hidden agenda (Start the game with this conspiracy face down in the command zone and secretly name a card. You may turn this conspiracy face up any time and reveal the chosen name.)\nWhenever a creature you control with the chosen name deals combat damage to a player, you may pay {U}. If you do, draw a card.
trans-unit.target: 秘案（开始游戏时将此诡局牌面朝下地置于统帅区，并私下决定一个牌名。你随时可以将此诡局翻回正面并公布该名称。） 每当一个由你操控且具该名称的生物对任一牌手造成战斗伤害时，你可以支付{U}。若你如此作，则抓一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: CN2·6 | Hold the Perimeter | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Hold the Perimeter
trans-unit.target: 坚守阵线

trans-unit.resname: CN2·6 | Hold the Perimeter | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: (Start the game with this conspiracy face up in the command zone.)\nAt the beginning of your first upkeep, put a 1/2 white Soldier creature token with defender onto the battlefield.\nAt the beginning of each other player's first upkeep, that player puts a 1/1 red Goblin creature token onto the battlefield with "This creature can't block."
trans-unit.target: （开始游戏时将此诡局牌面朝上地置于统帅区。） 在你的第一个维持开始时，将一个1/2白色，具守军异能的士兵衍生生物放进战场。 在每位其他牌手的第一个维持开始时，该牌手将一个1/1红色鬼怪衍生生物放进战场，且具有「此生物不能进行阻挡。」

trans-unit.source: (Start the game with this conspiracy face up in the command zone.)\nThe first creature spell you cast each turn costs {1} less to cast.\nYou can't cast instant or sorcery spells.
trans-unit.target: （开始游戏时将此诡局牌面朝上地置于统帅区。） 你每回合中第一个施放的生物咒语减少{1}来施放。 你不能施放瞬间或法术咒语。

trans-unit.resname: CN2·7 | Hymn of the Wilds | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Many attempt to speak with nature. Selvala speaks less, and nature answers more.
trans-unit.target: 许多人都试图与自然对谈。塞瓦拉谈得少，但自然应得多。

trans-unit.source: Sovereign's Realm
trans-unit.target: 君临全城

trans-unit.resname: CN2·10 | Sovereign's Realm | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source:
(Start the game with this conspiracy face up in the command zone.)
Your deck can't have basic land cards and your starting hand size is five.
Exile a card from your hand: This turn, you may play basic land cards from outside the game.
Basic lands you control have "{T}: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool."
trans-unit.target: （开始游戏时将此诡局牌面朝上地置于统帅区。） 你的套牌中不能有基本地牌，且你的起始手牌张数为五。 从你手上放逐一张牌：本回合中，你可以使用游戏外的基本地牌。 由你操控的基本地具有「{T}：加一点任意颜色的法术力到你的法术力池中。」

trans-unit.source: Summoner's Bond
trans-unit.target: 召唤师羁绊

trans-unit.resname: CN2·11 | Summoner's Bond | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Double agenda (Start the game with this conspiracy face down in the command zone and secretly name two different cards. You may turn this conspiracy face up any time and reveal the chosen names.)\nWhenever you cast a creature spell with one of the chosen names, you may search your library for a creature card with the other chosen name, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library.
trans-unit.target: 双重秘案（开始游戏时将此诡局牌面朝下地置于统帅区，并私下决定两个不同的牌名。你随时可以将此诡局翻回正面并公布这些名称。） 每当你施放具这两者之间任一名称的生物咒语时，你可以从你的牌库中搜寻一张具这两者之间另一名称的生物牌，展示该牌，将它置于你手上，然后将你的牌库洗牌。

trans-unit.source: Weight Advantage
trans-unit.target: 体格优势

trans-unit.resname: CN2·12 | Weight Advantage | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: (Start the game with this conspiracy face up in the command zone.)\nEach creature you control assigns combat damage equal to its toughness rather than its power.
trans-unit.target: （开始游戏时将此诡局牌面朝上地置于统帅区。） 由你操控的每个生物皆依照其防御力来分配战斗伤害，而不是依照力量。

trans-unit.source: When immovable object turns to unstoppable force, it's best to just get out of the way.
trans-unit.target: 要是坚不可摧之物变作无坚不摧之势，最好别挡路。

trans-unit.source: While voting, you may vote an additional time. (The votes can be for different choices or for the same choice.)
trans-unit.target: 投票时你可以额外多投票一次。（可以投票选择不同的选项或相同的选项。）

trans-unit.source: "Merchants and politicians differ only in name."\n—Queen Marchesa
trans-unit.target: 「商人和政客只是称呼不同而已。」 ～玛切莎女王

trans-unit.source: Custodi Peacekeeper

trans-unit.source: Reveal CARDNAME as you draft it and note how many cards you've drafted this draft round, including CARDNAME.\n{W}, {T}: Tap target creature with power less than or equal to the highest number you noted for cards named CARDNAME.
trans-unit.target: 于你抽选CARDNAME时展示之，并记下本轮抽圈次中包括CARDNAME在内你已抽选的牌数。 {W}，{T}：横置目标生物，且其力量须等于或小于你替名称为CARDNAME之牌记下的各数字间之最大值。

trans-unit.source: Custodi Soulcaller

trans-unit.source: Melee (Whenever this creature attacks, it gets +1/+1 until end of turn for each opponent you attacked with a creature this combat.)\nWhenever CARDNAME attacks, return target creature card with converted mana cost X or less from your graveyard to the battlefield, where X is the number of players you attacked with a creature this combat.
trans-unit.target: 乱斗（每当此生物攻击时，本次战斗中每有一位受你以生物攻击的对手，此生物便得+1/+1直到回合结束。） 每当CARDNAME攻击时，将目标总法术力费用等于或小于X的生物牌从你的坟墓场移回战场，X为本次战斗中受你以生物攻击的牌手数量。

trans-unit.resname: CN2·16 | Lieutenants of the Guard | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Lieutenants of the Guard
trans-unit.target: 侍卫副官

trans-unit.resname: CN2·16 | Lieutenants of the Guard | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Council's dilemma — When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, starting with you, each player votes for strength or numbers. Put a +1/+1 counter on CARDNAME for each strength vote and put a 1/1 white Soldier creature token onto the battlefield for each numbers vote.
trans-unit.target: 议争～当CARDNAME进战场时，由你开始，每位牌手各投票选择「力量」或「数量」。在CARDNAME上放置若干+1/+1指示物，其数量等同于投票选择「力量」的总票数；将若干1/1白色士兵衍生物放进战场，其数量等同于投票选择「数量」的总票数。

trans-unit.source: Noble Banneret
trans-unit.target: 贵族掌旗

trans-unit.resname: CN2·17 | Noble Banneret | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Draft CARDNAME face up.\nAs you draft a creature card, you may reveal it, note its name, then turn CARDNAME face down.\nAs long as you control one or more creatures with a name you noted for cards named CARDNAME, CARDNAME and those creatures get +1/+1 and have lifelink.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME以牌面朝上的方式进行轮抽。 于你抽选生物牌时，你可以展示该牌，记下其名称，然后将CARDNAME翻为牌面朝下。 对你替名称为CARDNAME之牌记下的各名称而言，只要你操控一个或多个与任一前述名称同名的生物，CARDNAME及这些生物便得+1/+1且具有系命异能。

trans-unit.source: Palace Jailer

trans-unit.resname: CN2·18 | Palace Jailer | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, you become the monarch.\nWhen CARDNAME enters the battlefield, exile target creature an opponent controls until an opponent becomes the monarch. (That creature returns under its owner's control.)
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，你成为君主。 当CARDNAME进战场时，放逐目标由对手操控的生物，直到任一对手成为君主为止。（该生物会在其拥有者的操控下移回。）

trans-unit.source: Palace Sentinels

trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, you become the monarch.

trans-unit.source: "One who ruled willing subjects would need no such protection."\n—Adriana, Captain of the Guard

trans-unit.source: Draft CARDNAME face up.\nAs you draft a creature card, you may reveal it, note its creature types, then turn CARDNAME face down.\nOther creatures you control of a type you noted for cards named CARDNAME get +1/+1.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME以牌面朝上的方式进行轮抽。 于你抽选生物牌时，你可以展示该牌，记下其生物类别，然后将CARDNAME翻为面朝下。 对你替名称为CARDNAME之牌记下的各类别而言，其他由你操控且为任一前述类别的生物得+1/+1。

trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，你成为君主。 所有将对你造成的伤害改为对CARDNAME造成之。

trans-unit.resname: CN2·21 | Protector of the Crown | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "I gladly offer my weapon and my life to the glory of my sovereign."
trans-unit.target: 「我甘为陛下荣光赴汤蹈火，万死不辞。」

trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a creature card with toughness 2 or less, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，你可以从你牌库中搜寻一张防御力等于或小于2的生物牌，展示该牌，将它置于你手上，然后将你的牌库洗牌。

trans-unit.resname: CN2·22 | Recruiter of the Guard | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Before a cause can have supporters, it has to have a voice.
trans-unit.target: 志业必先有卫护之声，才能招引卫护之士。

trans-unit.source: As CARDNAME enters the battlefield, choose a number.\nNoncreature spells with converted mana cost equal to the chosen number can't be cast.

trans-unit.source: "These halls are sacred. You *will* be silent."

trans-unit.source: "Rulers come and go, but my allegiance belongs to the throne."

trans-unit.target: 飞行 乱斗（每当此生物攻击时，本次战斗中每有一位受你以生物攻击的对手，此生物便得+1/+1直到回合结束。）

trans-unit.resname: CN2·26 | Wings of the Guard | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Within the city walls, Adriana's falcons hunt vermin of all kinds.
trans-unit.target: 城墙内诸般恶物都难逃亚卓安娜的猎鹰追捕。

trans-unit.source: Arcane Savant

trans-unit.source: Before you shuffle your deck to start the game, you may reveal this card from your deck and exile an instant or sorcery card you drafted that isn't in your deck.\nWhen CARDNAME enters the battlefield, copy a card you exiled with cards named CARDNAME. You may cast the copy without paying its mana cost.
trans-unit.target: 于你将你的套牌洗牌准备开始游戏前，你可以从你的套牌中展示此牌，并放逐一张你已抽选但不在你套牌中的瞬间或法术牌。 当CARDNAME进战场时，复制一张你以名称为CARDNAME之牌放逐的牌。你可以施放该复制品，且不需支付其法术力费用。

trans-unit.source: Canal Courier
trans-unit.target: 运河讯使

trans-unit.resname: CN2·28 | Canal Courier | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, you become the monarch.\nWhenever CARDNAME and another creature attack different players, CARDNAME can't be blocked this combat.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，你成为君主。 每当CARDNAME与另一个生物攻击不同的牌手时，CARDNAME本次战斗不能被阻挡。

trans-unit.source: The most effective roadways in Paliano aren't roads at all.
trans-unit.target: 帕兰诺最便捷的道路根本不是条路。

trans-unit.source: Coveted Peacock
trans-unit.target: 簇捧孔雀

trans-unit.resname: CN2·29 | Coveted Peacock | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Flying\nWhenever CARDNAME attacks, you may goad target creature defending player controls. (Until your next turn, that creature attacks each combat if able and attacks a player other than you if able.)
trans-unit.target: 飞行 每当CARDNAME攻击时，你可以煽惑目标由防御牌手操控的生物。（直到你的下一个回合，该生物每次战斗若能攻击，则必须攻击，且若能攻击除你以外的牌手，则必须如此作。）

trans-unit.source: Expropriate
trans-unit.target: 征用

trans-unit.source: Council's dilemma — Starting with you, each player votes for time or money. For each time vote, take an extra turn after this one. For each money vote, choose a permanent owned by the voter and gain control of it. Exile CARDNAME.
trans-unit.target: 议争～由你开始，每位牌手各投票选择「时间」或「金钱」。于本回合后进行额外的若干回合，其数量等同于投票选择「时间」的总票数。对投票选择「金钱」的各牌手而言，该牌手每如此投票一次，便选择一个由他拥有的永久物；你获得这些永久物的操控权。放逐CARDNAME。

trans-unit.source: Few things are more valuable than time or money—and Leovold has plenty of both.
trans-unit.target: 鲜有比时间或金钱更为宝贵的东西～而列沃德两者都非常充裕。

trans-unit.resname: CN2·31 | Illusion of Choice | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Illusion of Choice
trans-unit.target: 待议假象

trans-unit.resname: CN2·31 | Illusion of Choice | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: You choose how each player votes this turn.\nDraw a card.
trans-unit.target: 本回合中，由你选择每位牌手如何投票。 抓一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: CN2·31 | Illusion of Choice | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Please vote with a clear head and vigilant heart, knowing each voice is meaningful regardless of the outcome."\n—Ottavio d'Oro, Electoral Committee Speaker of Paliano

trans-unit.source: Mklthd had always hated crowds . . . and they had always hated him.

trans-unit.target: 飞行 议争～当CARDNAME进战场时，由你开始，每位牌手各投票选择「赏羽」或「制笔」。在CARDNAME上放置若干+1/+1指示物，其数量等同于投票选择「赏羽」的总票数；抓若干牌，其数量等同于投票选择「制笔」的总票数。你每以此法抓一张牌，便弃一张牌。

trans-unit.source: Reveal CARDNAME as you draft it. The next time a player drafts a card from this booster pack, guess that card's name. Then that player reveals the drafted card.\nFlying\nWhen CARDNAME enters the battlefield, if you guessed correctly for a card named CARDNAME, draw a card.

trans-unit.target: 消灭目标进行攻击的生物。

trans-unit.source: Mardu archers are trained in Dakla, the way of the bow. They never miss their target, no matter how small, how fast, or how far away.
trans-unit.target: 玛尔都弓箭手的驭弓之道称为巫箭流。不论多小、多快、多远的目标，他们都不会失手。

trans-unit.source: Pariah
trans-unit.target: 贱民

trans-unit.source: Enchant creature\nAll damage that would be dealt to you is dealt to enchanted creature instead.
trans-unit.target: 结附于生物 所有将对你造成的伤害改为对所结附的生物造成之。

trans-unit.source: "It is *not* sad," Radiant chided the lesser angel. "It is right. Every society must have its outcasts."
trans-unit.target: 「这一点都不可悲，」蕾荻安斥责着低阶的天使，「这才是常理。每个社会必有其弃民。」

trans-unit.resname: CN2·96 | Raise the Alarm | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Raise the Alarm
trans-unit.target: 扬起警报

trans-unit.resname: CN2·96 | Raise the Alarm | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Put two 1/1 white Soldier creature tokens onto the battlefield.
trans-unit.target: 将两个1/1白色士兵衍生生物放进战场。

trans-unit.resname: CN2·96 | Raise the Alarm | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Like blinking or breathing, responding to an alarm is an involuntary reflex.
trans-unit.target: 响应警报就如眨眼和呼吸一样，是一种下意识的反应。

trans-unit.source: Reviving Dose
trans-unit.target: 提神剂

trans-unit.source: You gain 3 life.\nDraw a card.
trans-unit.target: 你获得3点生命。 抓一张牌。

trans-unit.source: Samite healers never mix their pungent elixir with sweetener or tea. The threat of a second dose is enough to get most warriors back on their feet.
trans-unit.target: 撒姆尼人的医疗员从不在辛辣刺鼻的灵药里加入甘味或茶香。只消施药两回，便能让大多数战士如常步行。

trans-unit.resname: CN2·98 | Spirit of the Hearth | Card Name

trans-unit.target: 壁炉精怪

trans-unit.source: Flying\nYou have hexproof. (You can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.)
trans-unit.target: 飞行 你具有辟邪异能。（你不能成为由对手所操控之咒语或异能的目标。）

trans-unit.resname: CN2·98 | Spirit of the Hearth | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Thieves know that a snarl in the night means, "Rob another house."
trans-unit.target: 盗贼知道这夜里的吼声意思是「要抢去抢别家」。

trans-unit.source: Wild Griffin

trans-unit.source: Flying
trans-unit.target: 飞行

trans-unit.source: Farmers typically keep their flocks at thirteen sheep—one to distract the griffins while they take the other twelve to market.
trans-unit.target: 农人通常一群羊会养十三只～一只在去市场的路上诱开狮鹫，好让另外十二只可以抵达。

trans-unit.source: Windborne Charge
trans-unit.target: 风运冲锋

trans-unit.target: 直到回合结束，两个目标由你操控的生物各得+2/+2且获得飞行异能。

trans-unit.source: The merfolk call the sky goddess Emeria. The kor call her Kamsa. The two races agree on little except that she offers many blessings to the faithful.
trans-unit.target: 人鱼呼唤着天空女神伊美黎。寇族则称她为肯莎。这两族对此有诸多歧见，但都相信她能为信者带来无尽福祉。

trans-unit.target: 狂热重击

trans-unit.source: Target creature gets +2/+2 and gains first strike until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 直到回合结束，目标生物得+2/+2且获得先攻异能。

trans-unit.source: "Cower, fiend. The night is yours no longer."
trans-unit.target: 「怕了吧，恶物。夜晚再也不是你的地盘。」

trans-unit.target: 水银羁绊

trans-unit.target: {1}{U}，{T}：目标生物获得飞行异能直到回合结束。

trans-unit.resname: CN2·103 | Caller of Gales | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Some merfolk choose to rest their fins in the water. I believe wisdom exists not only where we were born but where we were told not to go."
trans-unit.target: 「有些人鱼决定安居水中。而我相信智慧不只存于所生之处，也存于我们被劝阻莫往之地。」

Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.)
When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, choose one —

trans-unit.resname: CN2·207 | Stormchaser Chimera | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Flying\n{2}{U}{R}: Scry 1, then reveal the top card of your library. CARDNAME gets +X/+0 until end of turn, where X is that card's converted mana cost. (To scry 1, look at the top card of your library, then you may put that card on the bottom of your library.)
trans-unit.target: 飞行 {2}{U}{R}：占卜1，然后展示你的牌库顶牌。CARDNAME得+X/+0直到回合结束，X为该牌的总法术力费用。（占卜1的流程是检视你牌库顶的牌，然后你可以将该牌置于你的牌库底。）

trans-unit.source: Bronze Sable
trans-unit.target: 青铜紫貂

trans-unit.source: The Champion stood alone between the horde of the Returned and the shrine to Karametra, cutting down scores among hundreds. She would have been overcome if not for the aid of the temple guardians whom Karametra awakened.\n—*The Theriad*
trans-unit.target: 天尊镇守通往卡拉美特拉神殿的要道，独力面对转世者大军。她虽已撂倒众多敌手，但仍身处以一敌百的困境。若非卡拉美特拉及时唤醒殿内守卫前往协助，天尊或将无力回天。 ～《塞洛亚特》

trans-unit.source: Hedron Matrix
trans-unit.target: 晶石间质

trans-unit.resname: CN2·209 | Hedron Matrix | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Equipped creature gets +X/+X, where X is its converted mana cost.\nEquip {4}
trans-unit.target: 佩带此武具的生物得+X/+X，X为其总法术力费用。 佩带{4}

trans-unit.source: The hedrons awoke along with the Eldrazi, forming superstructures that radiated overwhelming magic.
trans-unit.target: 晶石随着奥札奇苏醒，组成的超构造体放射庞大魔力。

trans-unit.source: Hexplate Golem
trans-unit.target: 六角板魔像

trans-unit.source: "Use everything. Iron, rust, scrap . . . even the ground must join our cause."\n—Ezuri, renegade leader
trans-unit.target: 「什么都用。钢，锈，废铁. . . 就连土地都该站在我们这边。」 ～叛军领袖伊祖黎

trans-unit.resname: CN2·211 | Horn of Greed | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Horn of Greed
trans-unit.target: 贪婪号角

trans-unit.resname: CN2·211 | Horn of Greed | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever a player plays a land, that player draws a card.
trans-unit.target: 每当任一牌手使用地时，该牌手抓一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: CN2·211 | Horn of Greed | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Rath grows, and I am nourished."\n—Volrath
trans-unit.target: 「瑞斯成长，我便得到滋养。」 ～瓦拉司

trans-unit.source: Kitesail
trans-unit.target: 航筝

trans-unit.source: Equipped creature gets +1/+0 and has flying.\nEquip {2} ({2}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)
trans-unit.target: 佩带此武具的生物得+1/+0且具有飞行异能。 佩带{2}（{2}：装备在目标由你操控的生物上。佩带的时机视同法术。）

trans-unit.source: Kitesailing is a way of life—and without practice, the end of it.
trans-unit.target: 驾驭航筝是一种生活方式～没好好练过的话，则是一种结束方式。

trans-unit.source: Opaline Unicorn
trans-unit.target: 清辉独角兽

trans-unit.resname: CN2·213 | Opaline Unicorn | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {T}: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool.
trans-unit.target: {T}：加一点任意颜色的法术力到你的法术力池中。

trans-unit.source: Purphoros once loved Nylea, the god of the hunt. His passion inspired his most astounding works of art.
trans-unit.target: 普罗烽斯曾经爱上了猎神倪勒娅。在激情的驱动下，他打造了最让人震惊的艺术作品。

trans-unit.source: Platinum Angel
trans-unit.target: 白金天使

trans-unit.resname: CN2·214 | Platinum Angel | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Flying\nYou can't lose the game and your opponents can't win the game.
trans-unit.target: 飞行 你这盘游戏不会输，对手也不会赢。

trans-unit.source: She is the apex of the artificer's craft, the spirit of the divine called out of base metal.
trans-unit.target: 她是神器师手艺的极致，以贱金属呼唤出的神性精魂。

trans-unit.source: Psychosis Crawler
trans-unit.target: 变态爬虫

trans-unit.resname: CN2·215 | Psychosis Crawler | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME's power and toughness are each equal to the number of cards in your hand.\nWhenever you draw a card, each opponent loses 1 life.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME的力量和防御力各等同于你的手牌数量。 每当你抓一张牌时，每位对手各失去1点生命。

trans-unit.source: "If that brain can't figure out the secret of the serum, then add more brains."\n—Rhmir, Hand of the Augur
trans-unit.target: 「如果那脑子无法理解浆液的秘密，就多加几个脑子。」 ～卜算手信众卢米

trans-unit.source: Runed Servitor
trans-unit.target: 符文随侍

trans-unit.resname: CN2·216 | Runed Servitor | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME dies, each player draws a card.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME死去时，每位牌手各抓一张牌。

trans-unit.source: Scholars had puzzled for centuries over the ruins at Tal Terig. Its secrets had always lived within one rune-carved head.
trans-unit.target: 塔帖立遗迹让学者思索数百年却找不到解答。其秘密一直就躲在个刻着符文的头里面。

trans-unit.source: Dread Statuary
trans-unit.target: 可怖雕像

trans-unit.resname: CN2·217 | Dread Statuary | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: {T}: Add {C} to your mana pool.\n{4}: CARDNAME becomes a 4/2 Golem artifact creature until end of turn. It's still a land.
trans-unit.target: {T}：加{C}到你的法术力池中。 {4}：CARDNAME成为4/2魔像神器生物直到回合结束。它仍然是地。

trans-unit.source: The last reliable landmark in Tazeem just walked away.
trans-unit.target: 塔晋最后一个可信赖的地标刚刚走掉了。

trans-unit.source: Evolving Wilds
trans-unit.target: 成形野地

trans-unit.resname: CN2·218 | Evolving Wilds | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {T}, Sacrifice CARDNAME: Search your library for a basic land card and put it onto the battlefield tapped. Then shuffle your library.
trans-unit.target: {T}，牺牲CARDNAME：从你的牌库中搜寻一张基本地牌，并将之横置放进战场。然后将你的牌库洗牌。

trans-unit.source: Without the interfering hands of civilization, nature will always shape itself to its own needs.
trans-unit.target: 若没有文明的干预，自然将始终按照它自己的需求塑造自身。

trans-unit.source: Exotic Orchard
trans-unit.target: 异国果园

trans-unit.resname: CN2·219 | Exotic Orchard | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {T}: Add to your mana pool one mana of any color that a land an opponent controls could produce.
trans-unit.target: {T}：加一点法术力到你的法术力池中，其颜色为由对手操控的地能产生之任一颜色。

trans-unit.source: "It was a strange morning. When we awoke, we found our trees transformed. We didn't know whether to water them or polish them."\n—Pulan, Bant orchardist
trans-unit.target: 「那是个奇怪的早晨。我们醒来时，就发现树变了样子。不晓得该要替它浇水还是把它擦亮。」 ～班特栽果人普兰

trans-unit.source: Rogue's Passage
trans-unit.target: 浪客小径

trans-unit.resname: CN2·220 | Rogue's Passage | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: {T}: Add {C} to your mana pool.\n{4}, {T}: Target creature can't be blocked this turn.
trans-unit.target: {T}：加{C}到你的法术力池中。 {4}，{T}：目标生物本回合不能被阻挡。

trans-unit.source: Rumors quickly spread among thieves about a labyrinth without walls and a prize beyond all measures of worth.
trans-unit.target: 这谣言很快在小偷之间传开：有座无墙的迷宫，藏有价值无可计量的宝藏。

trans-unit.source: Shimmering Grotto
trans-unit.target: 闪烁石室

trans-unit.resname: CN2·221 | Shimmering Grotto | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: {T}: Add {C} to your mana pool.\n{1}, {T}: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool.
trans-unit.target: {T}：加{C}到你的法术力池中。 {1}，{T}：加一点任意颜色的法术力到你的法术力池中。

trans-unit.source: Untold riches await those who forsake the bustling world to search the secret, silent places.
trans-unit.target: 数不清的财富等待着抛弃繁华世界，寻找僻静之处的人。

trans-unit.resname: CN2·222 | Kaya, Ghost Assassin | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Kaya, Ghost Assassin
trans-unit.target: 驱鬼卡娅

trans-unit.resname: CN2·222 | Kaya, Ghost Assassin | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: 0: Exile CARDNAME or up to one target creature. Return that card to the battlefield under its owner's control at the beginning of your next upkeep. You lose 2 life.\n−1: Each opponent loses 2 life and you gain 2 life.\n−2: Each opponent discards a card and you draw a card.
trans-unit.target: 0：放逐CARDNAME或至多一个目标生物。在你的下一个维持开始时，将该牌在其拥有者的操控下移回战场。你失去2点生命。 −1：每位对手各失去2点生命且你获得2点生命。 −2：每位对手各弃一张牌且你抓一张牌。
